languages.text: "Конечно, в вашей власти поменять свое решение щелчком пальцев, но претворять это в жизнь будут тысячи и тысячи функционеров Администратума. Сначала они должны зафиксировать предыдущий статус десятины, затем — начать не менее долгий процесс перерегистрации подати. Как слуги порядка и закона мы не можем просто проскочить неудобные моменты: должно скрупулезно следовать процедурам, иначе мы погрязнем в анархии".

"Of course you have the power to change your decision at the snap of your fingers, but its implementation will fall to thousands upon thousands of Administratum functionaries. They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, в вашей власти поменять свое решение щелчком пальцев, но претворять это в жизнь будут тысячи и тысячи функционеров Администратума. Сначала они должны зафиксировать предыдущий статус десятины, затем — начать не менее долгий процесс перерегистрации подати. Как слуги порядка и закона мы не можем просто проскочить неудобные моменты: должно скрупулезно следовать процедурам, иначе мы погрязнем в анархии".

They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."

languages.text: "Natürlich könnt Ihr Eure Entscheidung mit einem Fingerschnippen ändern, aber ihre Umsetzung wird Tausenden und Abertausenden Funktionären des Administratums zufallen. Sie müssen zunächst den vorherigen Status des Zehnts erfassen und dann den ebenso langwierigen Prozess der erneuten Registrierung der Bezahlung einleiten. Als Diener von Gesetz und Ordnung können wir die anstrengenden Teile nicht einfach überspringen: Wir müssen uns penibel an die Vorgaben halten, sonst versinken wir in Anarchie."
languages.original_text: "Of course you have the power to change your decision at the snap of your fingers, but its implementation will fall to thousands upon thousands of Administratum functionaries. They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich könnt Ihr Eure Entscheidung mit einem Fingerschnippen ändern, aber ihre Umsetzung wird Tausenden und Abertausenden Funktionären des Administratums zufallen. Sie müssen zunächst den vorherigen Status des Zehnts erfassen und dann den ebenso langwierigen Prozess der erneuten Registrierung der Bezahlung einleiten. Als Diener von Gesetz und Ordnung können wir die anstrengenden Teile nicht einfach überspringen: Wir müssen uns penibel an die Vorgaben halten, sonst versinken wir in Anarchie."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, vous avez le pouvoir de revenir sur votre décision en claquant des doigts, mais son application retombera sur des milliers de fonctionnaires de l'Administratum. Ils devront d'abord consigner le précédent état de la dîme, avant d'entamer un processus tout aussi long visant à en réenregistrer le paiement. En tant que serviteurs de la loi et de l'ordre, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de faire l'impasse sur la procédure, si compliquée soit-elle. Elle doit être suivie à la lettre, sans quoi l'anarchie nous menace. »
languages.original_text: "Of course you have the power to change your decision at the snap of your fingers, but its implementation will fall to thousands upon thousands of Administratum functionaries. They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, vous avez le pouvoir de revenir sur votre décision en claquant des doigts, mais son application retombera sur des milliers de fonctionnaires de l'Administratum. Ils devront d'abord consigner le précédent état de la dîme, avant d'entamer un processus tout aussi long visant à en réenregistrer le paiement. En tant que serviteurs de la loi et de l'ordre, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de faire l'impasse sur la procédure, si compliquée soit-elle. Elle doit être suivie à la lettre, sans quoi l'anarchie nous menace. »

languages.text: “当然，您确实有权随时随地改变您的决定，但由此带来的所有实际工作，都会落在帝国内政部成千上万位职员身上。首先，他们必须记录什一税之前的状态，这个过程会耗费漫长的时间。在此之后，他们需要进行同样漫长的重新登记工作。毕竟，我们是律法与秩序的仆人，无权擅自跳过那些繁琐的流程。我们必须一丝不苟地按照规章制度办事，以免行政工作陷入混乱。”
languages.original_text: "Of course you have the power to change your decision at the snap of your fingers, but its implementation will fall to thousands upon thousands of Administratum functionaries. They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."

traits.locale_text: “当然，您确实有权随时随地改变您的决定，但由此带来的所有实际工作，都会落在帝国内政部成千上万位职员身上。首先，他们必须记录什一税之前的状态，这个过程会耗费漫长的时间。在此之后，他们需要进行同样漫长的重新登记工作。毕竟，我们是律法与秩序的仆人，无权擅自跳过那些繁琐的流程。我们必须一丝不苟地按照规章制度办事，以免行政工作陷入混乱。”

languages.text: «Por supuesto, tiene el poder de cambiar su decisión con chascar los dedos, pero su implementación recaerá sobre miles y miles de funcionarios del Administratum. Primero tendrán que registrar el estado anterior del diezmo y después empezarán el proceso igualmente largo de registrar de nuevo el pago. Como sirvientes de la ley y el orden, no podemos pasar por alto las partes más incómodas: debemos seguir el protocolo a rajatabla para evitar todo riesgo de caer en la anarquía».
languages.original_text: "Of course you have the power to change your decision at the snap of your fingers, but its implementation will fall to thousands upon thousands of Administratum functionaries. They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, tiene el poder de cambiar su decisión con chascar los dedos, pero su implementación recaerá sobre miles y miles de funcionarios del Administratum. Primero tendrán que registrar el estado anterior del diezmo y después empezarán el proceso igualmente largo de registrar de nuevo el pago. Como sirvientes de la ley y el orden, no podemos pasar por alto las partes más incómodas: debemos seguir el protocolo a rajatabla para evitar todo riesgo de caer en la anarquía».

languages.text: 「もちろん、指を鳴らすだけで決定を変える権限があなたにはあります。ですがその実行は何千、何万もの帝国行政局の職員に委ねられます。彼らはまず、租税の以前の状況を記録し、その後、同じくらい時間のかかる再登録の手続きを開始しなければなりません。法と秩序の奉仕者として、面倒な部分を単に省くわけにはいきません。手続きは細心の注意を払って遵守されなければなりません。さもなければ無秩序に陥ってしまいますから」
languages.original_text: "Of course you have the power to change your decision at the snap of your fingers, but its implementation will fall to thousands upon thousands of Administratum functionaries. They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、指を鳴らすだけで決定を変える権限があなたにはあります。ですがその実行は何千、何万もの帝国行政局の職員に委ねられます。彼らはまず、租税の以前の状況を記録し、その後、同じくらい時間のかかる再登録の手続きを開始しなければなりません。法と秩序の奉仕者として、面倒な部分を単に省くわけにはいきません。手続きは細心の注意を払って遵守されなければなりません。さもなければ無秩序に陥ってしまいますから」

languages.text: "Siz elbette dilediğinizce kararınızı değiştirebilirsiniz lakin bu yeni kararın uygulanması, binlerce Administratum işyarına düşecektir. İlk olarak aşarın önceki hâlini kayda geçirmeleri, ardından da ödemeyi yeniden kayda geçirmek için yine aynı derecede uzun bir sürece başlamaları gerekecektir. Hukuk ve düzenin hizmetkârları olarak bu zahmetli kısımları öylece atlayıp geçemeyiz. Anarşiye sürüklenmemek için bu prosedürleri titizlikle uygulamamız gerekir."
languages.original_text: "Of course you have the power to change your decision at the snap of your fingers, but its implementation will fall to thousands upon thousands of Administratum functionaries. They will have to first record the previous status of the tithe, and then begin an equally lengthy process of re-registering the payment. As servants of law and order, we cannot simply skip the cumbersome parts: procedure must be followed meticulously, lest we become mired in anarchy."

İlk olarak aşarın önceki hâlini kayda geçirmeleri, ardından da ödemeyi yeniden kayda geçirmek için yine aynı derecede uzun bir sürece başlamaları gerekecektir. Hukuk ve düzenin hizmetkârları olarak bu zahmetli kısımları öylece atlayıp geçemeyiz. Anarşiye sürüklenmemek için bu prosedürleri titizlikle uygulamamız gerekir."
